short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps digest and save bike share data (you own it after all), with some nifty visualizations as well

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you own your own Bike Share Toronto data. It allows for easy export and also adds some nifty visualizations. More visualizations will be added on demand.

This was largely just formed out of a need that I had to view some historical records of my bike rides. The code is entirely open source here: https://github.com/wahidshafique/toronto-bike-share-visualizer
